title: Problem getting photos on Pixel 5
content:
Hi all, 
I have just moved from a Pixel 2XL to a Pixel 5 - Most of the transfer went great.  However I have an issue with the Photos app.

I have thousands of photos stored (from my Pixel 2XL) in my Google One drive (I have a 1tb plan).

When I open Photos on the Pixel 5 the first screen has about 7 or 8 photos (a couple from last month and a couple from 5 years ago!) and just says "Getting your photos..." at the top (with a moving line underneath).  This has been like this for about 30 hours now.  The phone has been turned on constantly and has a great wifi connection.

If I select "Library" at the bottom right I can see all the google create libraries (and look at the photos in them).

Is there anything I can do to speed up the process or is it stuck ?

Any help would be much appreciated.
